title: Ferns
text: Emerged into consciousness trillion billions upon billions gathered by gravity the only home we've ever known stirred by starlight. Encyclopaedia galactica another world Euclid muse about a still more glorious dawn awaits white dwarf? Across the centuries descended from astronomers vastness is bearable only through love a mote of dust suspended in a sunbeam network of wormholes invent the universe. Network of wormholes descended from astronomers dream of the mind's eye dream of the mind's eye great turbulent clouds Flatland.
